pages.name: Home
pages.title: Front-end developer
pages.content: My name is Oleg, I'm a front-end developer. My main profile is creating landing pages for medium-sized businesses. I suggest you to watch a presentation on my skills and on some projects.

pages.name: Skills
pages.title: Skills developer
pages.content: I use modern 'features' in my work, as part of support for the project.

pages.content: Commercial projects at the link below. And also on my github.

works.name: Cross New Balance
works.descript: Lightweight, fast, adaptive. Promo site for mono products. Quick start for the project. The site is fully responsive and supported on all devices.

works.name: SMM agency Honeylead
works.descript: The site is fully responsive and supported on all devices. Easy and quick landing with feedback forms. The site covers the need for demonstration of agency cases

works.name: Private cinema 'Swing'
works.descript: The site is fully responsive and supported on all devices. To demonstrate the halls of the cinema, sliders and a gallery were used. A calculator was developed to calculate the cost of booking rooms, taking into account the wishes of the client.
